# panop Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "panop" {
  skip_tls_verify = true
  host            = "tower.panop.io"
  access_key      = ""
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `host` (String) Tower Host

### Optional

- `access_key` (String) Tower access key
- `skip_tls_verify` (Boolean) Skip TLS verify
